title: City Police Simulator - Cop Car Games & Shooter

trophies.trophyDetail: Master all the skills and earn all the trophies. With this ultimate trophy, you'll be the greatest cop the city has ever seen and a true legend of law enforcement.
Purchase the E250 Special from the market and show off your cool style with this sleek ride.
Take charge of Taurus by purchasing it. With this set of wheels, you'll be the envy of your fellow officers.
Show your bravery and power by purchasing the E250 from the market. This beast of a vehicle will make any criminal think twice before crossing your path.
Take control of Charger 2011 car. This reliable ride will be your partner in crime-fighting for many missions to come.
Step up your game by donning the Private suit. With its sharp look and superior comfort, you'll feel like a true detective on the beat.
Stand out from the crowd with the Specialist suit. This high-tech outfit will give you an edge in any situation, from car chases to stakeouts.
Command respect with the Corporal suit. This classic uniform is a symbol of your dedication to the force and your commitment to justice.
Take charge of any situation with the Sergeant suit. With its commanding presence and sleek design, you'll be the leader of the pack.
Show off your skills with the Staff Sergeant suit. This versatile uniform is perfect for any mission, whether it's busting drug rings or chasing down fugitives.
Rise to the top with the Master Sergeant suit. This elite outfit is reserved for the best of the best, and you've earned it through your hard work and dedication.
Lead by example with the First Sergeant suit. This prestigious uniform is a symbol of your leadership and courage on the front lines of law enforcement.
Take down 50 enemies with the Burotta and earn the respect of your fellow officers. This iconic weapon is a symbol of your skill and precision as a marksman.
Master the X9 and take out 50 enemies with ease. This reliable firearm is a must-have for any officer looking to take down criminals with speed and accuracy.
Show off your skill with the MMP32 by eliminating 50 enemies from a distance. This high-tech weapon is a favorite of officers and sharpshooters alike.
Take down 50 enemies with the SWW19 and show them who's boss. This classic revolver is a symbol of your old-school toughness and determination.
Prove your worth with the FAH1 by taking out 150 enemies in the heat of battle. This versatile assault rifle is a favorite of SWAT teams and special forces around the world.
Master the NP5 and take out 150 enemies with ease. This compact submachine gun is perfect for close-quarters combat and high-speed chases.
Show your skill with the HKNP5C by taking down 150 enemies with pinpoint accuracy. This high-tech weapon is a favorite of elite law enforcement units around the globe.
Take down 150 enemies with the FAN SCAP and show off your expert marksmanship. This battle-tested rifle is a symbol of your professionalism and skill.
Take out 130 enemies with the BenA4 and earn the respect of your fellow officers. This shotgun is a versatile and reliable choice for close-quarters combat.
Show your grit and determination by taking out 130 enemies with the Nossenberg. This shotgun is a true workhorse, perfect for taking down bad guys in any situation.
Prove your skill with the A Shorts by taking out 130 enemies with precision and accuracy. This shotgun is a favorite of close-range marksmen.
Take out 130 enemies with the SS-12 and show off your destructive power. This automatic shotgun is a force to be reckoned with, perfect for taking out multiple targets at once.
Show off your expertise with the OP9A1 by taking down 50 enemies with deadly accuracy, while scoping. This sniper rifle is a favorite of special forces and elite snipers around the world.
Master the MMA1 and take out 50 enemies with precision and skill. This classic rifle is a symbol of your dedication to the art of marksmanship.
Take down 50 enemies with the Rennington and show them who's boss. This classic rifle is a staple of law enforcement and a symbol of your toughness and determination.
Take down 50 enemies with the Birka N82 and show off your expert marksmanship. This powerful sniper rifle is a favorite of elite marksmen and a symbol of your dominance on the battlefield.
Pull over 100 cars and show your dedication to keeping the streets safe. With this trophy, you'll be recognized as a true guardian of the law.
Arrest 100 citizens for breaking the law and show them that crime doesn't pay. With this trophy, you'll be known as a force to be reckoned with and a defender of justice.
Keep a sharp eye out for violations and check at least 50 people for any wrongdoing. With this trophy, you'll show your commitment to keeping the streets safe for all citizens.
Use the Taser to safely neutralize 50 enemies without killing them and show your dedication to preserving life. With this trophy, you'll be known as a skilled and compassionate officer.
Upgrade a weapon to 3 stars and show your dedication to excellence. With this trophy, you'll be recognized as a true master of your craft and a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Drive at least 50km using any car and show your mastery of the streets. With this trophy, you'll be recognized as a skilled driver and a true road warrior. Whether you're chasing down criminals or cruising through the city, this trophy proves that you're the king of the road.
